text: The ninth season of the Romanian reality talent show Vocea României premiered on ProTV on September 6, 2019.Irina Rimes, Tudor Chirilă and Smiley returned as coaches, while Horia Brenciu, who last coached in the third season, returned, replacing Andra. Meanwhile, Pavel Bartoș returned for his ninth season as host. ==Auditions== The open call auditions were held in the following locations: {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; line- height:17px; width:55%;" |- ! Date ! Audition venue ! The artists from each team were split up into groups of three. At the end of each knockout round the coach then decided out of the three artists who won. The coaches can each steal one losing artist from another team. The top 24 contestants then move on to the Battles round. Colour key: {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 90%; white-space: nowrap;" |- | style="background:lightgreen; border:1px solid black;"| | Artist won the Knockouts and advanced to the Live shows |- | style="background:#b0e0e6; border:1px solid black;"| | Artist lost the Knockouts but was stolen by another coach and advanced to the Live shows |- | style="background:pink; border:1px solid black;"| |bgcolor="pink"|"Do I Wanna Know?" | — | — | | — |- |18 |bgcolor="lightgreen"|Amanda Aprotosoaei |"Ice Ice Baby" |colspan="4" |- |} ==The Battles== After the Knockauts, Team Brenciu and Team Smiley and Team Tudor had six contestants, while Team Irina had seven contestants for the Battle rounds. The Battles rounds started with episode 13 on November 29, 2019. Coaches began narrowing down the playing field by training the contestants. Each battle concluding with the respective coach advancing one of the two or three contestants. Color key: {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 90%; white-space: nowrap;" |- | style="background:#fdfc8f; border:1px solid black;"| | Artist won the Battle and advanced to the Knockouts |- | style="background:#b0e0e6; border:1px solid black;"| | Artist lost the Battle but was stolen by another coach and advanced to the Live shows |- | style="background:pink; border:1px solid black;"| | Artist lost the Battle and was eliminated |} ===Episode 13 (29 November)=== The thirteenth episode aired on November 29, 2019. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; width:90%;" |- ! Song |- | 1 |Top 12 | "Dream On" |- |} ===Week 2 - Semi-final (13 December)=== All eight remaining contestants performed two songs each in the semi-final on Friday, December 13, 2019: one solo song and a trio with the coach and the other teammate. The public vote could save one contestant from each team, the second one was eliminated. {|class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; width:100%;" |+Episode 15 (December 13) !style="width:10%;"| Coach !style="width:02%;"| Order !style="width:18%;"| Artist !style="width:20%;"| Solo Song !style="width:02%;"| Order !style="width:20%;"| Trio Song !style="width:10%;"| Result |- |rowspan="2"|Horia Brenciu |2 |bgcolor="pink"|Adriana Simionescu |bgcolor="pink"|"Who You Are" |rowspan="2"|6 |rowspan="2"|"That's Life" |bgcolor="pink"|Eliminated |- |11 |Elena Bozian |"Forever Young" |bgcolor="#fdfc8f" | Public vote |- |rowspan="2"|Irina Rimes |3 |bgcolor="pink"|Bogdan Dumitraș |bgcolor="pink"|"Who Wants to Live Forever" |rowspan="2"|10 |rowspan="2"|"Blow" |bgcolor="pink"|Eliminated |- |8 |Jasmina Răsădean |"Lume, lume, soro lume" |bgcolor="#fdfc8f" | Public vote |- |rowspan="2"|Tudor Chirilă |4 |bgcolor="pink"|Mădălina Lefter |bgcolor="pink"|"When Doves Cry" |rowspan="2"|12 |rowspan="2"|"Calul din Malboro" |bgcolor="pink"|Eliminated |- |7 |Dragoș Moldovan |"Always" |bgcolor="#fdfc8f" | Public vote |- |rowspan="2"|Smiley |5 |bgcolor="pink"|Elena Ilie |bgcolor="pink"|"Dance Monkey" |rowspan="2"|1 |rowspan="2"|"Oficial îmi merge bine" |bgcolor="pink"|Eliminated |- |9 |Andi Țolea |"Angels" |bgcolor="#fdfc8f" | Public vote |} ===Week 3 - Final (20 December)=== The top 4 contestants performed in the grand final on Friday, December 20, 2019. This week, the four finalists performed a solo song, a duet with a special guest and a duet with their coach. The public vote determined the winner, and that resulted in a victory for Dragoș Moldovan, Tudor Chirilă's fourth victory as a coach. == Elimination chart == ;Color key ;Artist info ;Result details === Overall === {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%;text-align:center;width:85%" !
